enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Following the conclusion of COP-7, the newly elected Executive Board of the Clean Development Mechanism held its first meeting.
The Board elected John Ashe (Antigua and Barbuda) as its first Chair and Sozaburo Okamatsu (Japan) as Vice Chair.
The Board also set the agenda for its second meeting, which will be held from 21- 23 January 2002 in Bonn.
